original_text: The Lord has joined you together, as a man with his wife. Your body and your spirit belong to him. Why did God put you together? He wanted you to have children who would belong to him. So think carefully about how you live. Do not leave the wife that you married when you were a young man.
korean_text: 그에게는 영이 충만하였으나 오직 하나를 만들지 아니하셨느냐 어찌하여 하나만 만드셨느냐 이는 경건한 자손을 얻고자 하심이라 그러므로 네 심령을 삼가 지켜 어려서 맞이한 아내에게 거짓을 행하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has joined you together
as a man with his wife
Your body and your spirit belong to him
Why did God put you together?
He wanted you to have children
So think carefully about how you live
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 너희가 사는 방식을 신중히 생각하라

sentences.original_text: that you married when you were a young man
